post_text: Coldspring-Oakhurst High School CTE students visited Baker's Signs on Manufacturing Day 2019. They were given hands-on instruction and a behind-the-scenes look at the sign-making business. Thanks to Baker's Signs for hosting our students and making our logo into an awesome sign for the high school. Thanks also to the COHS A/V classes and teacher Mary Trimmer for taking the photos and video and putting this collage together. Great job! The music is from Filmstro and they give rights to use the music.
